thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Neil Shaw
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Neil Shaw

author: Neil Shaw
title: Neil Shaw
text: Apart from being possibly the best and roomiest train system the trains were always on time, quiet and fast. I think they are the most convenient to sightsee in Japan. The network is extensive. The toilets were always clean and the staff were helpful, efficient and polite. A pleasure to travel.
